settings.content: This page allows you to customize the look and feel of your site in many different ways. It also allows you to turn on and off features you may or may not need. Please see our extensive [ShowTime Theme Documentation](http://docs.milehighthemes.com/showtime) to learn more about how to customize your site.

If you require additional support for ShowTime, please visit our [help center](http://support.milehighthemes.com/) for answers to common questions. You can also submit a support request from our help center.

settings.content: Images will automatically scale to fit the full width of the user's screen. To ensure the highest quality on all screen resolutions, upload images that are at least 1400px wide. We recommend 1600 x 800px. For best results, keep all your slideshow images the same size.
We recommend images at least 800px wide. Height is flexible but the images in each row should be the same height. [Aspect ratio calculator](http://andrew.hedges.name/experiments/aspect_ratio/)
